movie_title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
title: Great Film!
review: This is one of the best movies I've ever seen. While looking incredibly bizarre, it somehow feels more real than any movie you could imagine - at least here, in America. The person who designed the costumes was obviously a genius, but the actors, the dialog, and the entire story are also superb. I think more imagination went into this than into the entire Hollywood catalog of films, which is probably not saying a lot, but believe me - it's very very original. Needless to say, I'm giving it a 10.

title: average
review: I thought the only good part was the music by Simon and Garfunkel. Otherwise it's a pretty average film.
